EmailTemplate.description: HAE: When a case status is changed from null to 'New' for auto case creation.
EmailTemplate.name: HAE New Auto Case Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: New Case [{!Case.CaseNumber}] has been created.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName},
A case with Case Number [{!Case.CaseNumber}] has been created with a due date of [{!Case.Due_Date__c}]. We will keep you posted with the updates on your request.
Thanks,
Customer Services Team,
Haemonetics Corporation
